mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (id, login_name, login_password, dept_id, real_name, sex, phone, email, qq, create_time, remark,enable) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_user set login_name = #{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=CHAR}, real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, login_name, login_password, dept_id, real_name, sex, phone, email, qq, create_time, remark,enable from sys_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
